translations: 明白了（非正式，等于 got you）

sentences.sentence: You can find more information about the wrapped array style in the article  "Array Gotcha—Null Array vs. Empty Array".
sentences.translation: 您在《Array Gotcha—Null Array vs. Empty Array》这篇文章中可以找到更多关于包装排列风格的信息。

sentences.sentence: Adam: Gotcha?... OK. Here they are.
